review:
It was that day when my husband and I were on cloud nine as I tested positive for pregnancy. It was indeed a joyous moment and it was the time to choose the best Obstetrician to ensure the whole course of nine months of tenure and delivery of our child is in safe hands and then Google suggested us Dr. Madhavi Reddy.

So we consulted  Dr. Madhavi Reddy and I must say we  instantly knew we made the right decision; she is the best. She is a very good listener, spends lot of time interacting and listening to her patients and gives practical advice, very down to earth person and last but not the least very highly qualified in terms of practical experience. She ensured both mother and baby were doing good whenever we went for routine check-ups.

Days flew by, months passed by, it was October 16th (around 9 PM) I started getting cramp like pain and I knew our baby had started making her way to this beautiful world. I waited till early morning of 17th October and then we messaged Dr. Madhavi Reddy (despite of early morning) and she replied and told us that she will reach out to emergency duty doctor. We reached hospital around 7 AM on 17th October and I was admitted without any hassle. The duty doctor visited us immediately and confirmed that I was already in labor and dilated by 3 cm. We were really excited and at the same time a bit scared. This was that time it seemed the time was in slow motion. Dr. Madhavi Reddy visited us at around 9.30 AM, spoke to us and gave courage as she told us that she will be going ahead with normal delivery (based on her experience and as there were no complications she knew the best). Slowly I started getting pains on and off. Finally when it was the time to push, the real adventure started.
Dr. confirmed that the baby is almost there and it was just the final push which was required from my end. Time was moving slowly and I was not able to push. Dr. Madhavi Reddy motivated me and assured that this was the last push which needs to be made. 
Thanks to Almighty and Dr. Madhavi Reddy for the support and motivation, that final push was made and our little darling princess was delivered safely and healthily. It was a memorable and beautiful ride inside the labor room, only because we had Dr. Madhavi Reddy beside us and it was the smoothest without any hurdles or obstacles. 

I could bear all the pain and was enjoying this journey only because of the courage Dr. Madhavi Reddy gave me, along with the jokes we were cracking on labour bed.

A big thanks to Dr. Madhavi Reddy for ensuring the safe delivery and taking care of me and our little one throughout the course of nine months. We definitely owe Dr. Madhavi Reddy for everything that she has done for us and for our little one. HEARTFELT THANKS !!! 

From being a girl who was scared of hospitals, needles, pain and blood to giving birth via normal delivery, is indeed an achievement for me and it was only because of Dr. Madhavi Reddy's motivation and support. From the first day I met her to till the day I went into labour, she always encouraged me for normal delivery and all because of the trust she gained by her experience I could make up my mind for normal delivery.

We strongly recommend Dr. Madhavi Govinda Reddy to all the mom and dad to be soon couples. She is the best in Obstetrics & Gynaecology. With her level of experience and knowledge you will definitely be in safe hands. No second thoughts or doubt about it.

review:
I am Gritika Jena, a BDL at One Source, Kasturi Nagar,  Bangalore conceived my first child in last week of April 2021.  I was having no knowledge regarding Matrimony Hospitals at Bangalore, since I had moved from Chandigarh to Bangalore in March 2020 after my marriage.  My  in laws who are staying here since last 20 years and they wanted me to choose the best matrimony hospital at Bangalore, having good reputation.  They proposed some names and advised me to check and finalise the Hospital after checking their reviews.
We made enquiries from our neighbourhood, who just had recent deliveries and also searched through internet and finally decided to have delivery at Motherhood, Kalyan Nagar.  Also regarding choosing doctor who will take personal care and advise is also a challenge.  After going through the panel of doctors, I decided to choose Doctor Madhavi Reddy to look after my case.  Here I confess that my choice of choosing Doctor Madhavi Reddy was call from my sixth sense and God’s advice which proved to be so rewarding and worthy which I can’t express in words.
From the very first day on 14th June  2022, when I met her and the way she consoled me and treated me as if I am a member of her family.  Being the mother of first child, I was clue less about the whole process of delivery, that too at the time of COVID 2nd phase.  She handled me in such a personal bonding that I never felt that She is my doctor and I am her patient.  I was in a mindset that most of the hospitals used to carry out C Section rather than going for normal delivery.  From very beginning of my interaction with her, she  advised me to carry out normal delivery, but I was not believing her words.  Also my case was a little bit peculiar, as the position of the child was not normal till the last check carried out on 20th  January 2022, but she consoled me not to lose hope of normal delivery.  
On final day, that is on 24 January 2022, I reported to the hospital for delivery, though there was no sign of labour pain. But after checking, they admitted me for delivery in the afternoon.  Doctor Madhavi Reddy consoled me of having normal delivery and told me to try for that.  Though, they had lost the hope of normal delivery may be due to abnormal position of my child and the 2nd problem of stoppage of internal secretion of delivery fluid, but they tried their best to have a normal delivery.  A team of five doctors and nurses tried their best and finally at 11pm I delivered my first child a beautiful baby girl child and that too in the process of normal delivery.
I will never forget Doctor Madhavi Reddy for her invaluable help and guidance in the process of having my first baby and I thank and admire her and the whole team of Motherhood, Kalyan Nagar in helping out me.  Not only Doctor Madhavi Reddy, but the whole other staffs at Motherhood, Kalyan Nagar are very helpful and duty bound.  To mention one more name Mrs. Rama, who was looking after the Insurance claim and billing procedures, helped me a lot. Insurance from my first Insurance Agency completed on 10th January 2022 and my employer changed the Insurance Company and I could manage to get virtual insurance card on 21 Jan 2022, but still she coordinated with the Insurance Company and helped me getting the Insurance amount by the time I was discharged on 26th January 2022.
I will never hesitate to advise the all potential mothers to choose MOTHERHOOD Hospital, Kalayan Nagar as their destination and Doctor Madhavi Reddy as their personal doctor.
Thanking you.
Gritika Jena

review:
I consulted Dr.Madhavi Reddy on my 38th week of pregnancy as my consulting doctor was not available for next 3 weeks. We were given few options,we choose Madhavi Reddy among them,that was the best decision ever made.It is always a stress in mind when such things happen, but just by first visit we were convinced she is the right doctor for us. 

She is very patient,calm and friendly. She gave her contact number in case of emergency (which I had not got from my previous doctor). In 3 days after visiting her,I got my labor pain and I contacted her through Watsapp n call , she responded even at night 11.30. After visiting the hospital my contractions were not strong enough.She suggested to go back home n come back when pain frequency increases or water breaks or I can't tolerate pain. 

Next day my pain increased, I got admitted at afternoon. She visited me immediately. I had 2 fibroids and amiontic fluid levels were quite high. Other doctors I consulted had told, with fibroids it would be difficult for normal delivery. She never scared me or told such things. 

For next 10 hours she kept on visiting every one hour or two. Sometimes she was asking the duty doctors to send a video of the NST. This was when my baby's heartbeat started showing low after giving oxytocin.At this stage other doctors would have gone for c - section. But she stopped oxytocin and gave me oxygen mask n tried if that showed any improvement. Yes it did. 

Even after that my cervix was not diluted enough and the baby was still in -3 position. It would have needed another 8 hours of labour. She was ready to wait for such a long duration. Luckily when she came at 10pm , cervix was diluted enough and baby was in the right position for delivery. Within half n hour the baby was delivered normally.

She tries 100% for normal delivery. I strongly recommend her.she is very friendly and open to all our doubts.

God bless you and your family.

review: My experience with Dr Madhavi is very good. After trying to conceive for six months, when nothing happened I consulted Dr Madhavi Reddy. Withing 1st consultation she suggested me for PCOD scan. I doubted her diagnosis as my cycles were regular. But still, I followed her suggestion and the same day did ultrasound scanning. Yes, it was both sides nice polycystic ovaries. She gave the advice to follow proper exercise and diet with 250mg of Metformin to regulate my hormones for two months and to try naturally. In the third month, she suggested me for a follicular scan. When the follicular size was good she gave me a trigger dose (IM) so that ovulation happens. Next month I thanked her with the Happy News. Now, I am eight-month pregnant. My ANC checkups with her are very smooth. Every month every step and report she explains me very well. She is not only experienced in her field but also as a person very humble and approachable. Thank you Dr Madhavi for this lovely blessing.
